action.text: Read twice and referred to the Committee on Banking, Housing, and Urban Affairs.

committee.name: Senate Banking, Housing, and Urban Affairs

bill.summary:
Reforming Finance for Local Economies Act
This bill exempts banks, credit unions, and savings associations with $10 billion or less in total consolidated assets from all regulations issued under the Dodd-Frank Wall Street Reform and Consumer Protection Act.
